AJT.title: Adjustment Details
AJT.description: To identify the reason for an adjustment.

ALC.title: Allowance Or Charge
ALC.description: To identify allowance or charge details.

ALI.title: Additional Information
ALI.description: To indicate that special conditions due to the origin, customs preference, fiscal or commercial factors are applicable.

APR.title: Additional Price Information
APR.description: To provide information concerning pricing related to class of trade, price multiplier, and reason for change.

ARD.title: Monetary Amount Function
ARD.description: To provide details of the function of a monetary amount.

ARR.title: Array Information
ARR.description: To contain the data in an array.

ASI.title: Array Structure Identification
ASI.description: To identify the structure of an array.

AUT.title: Authentication Result
AUT.description: To specify results of the application of an authentication procedure.

BAS.title: Basis
BAS.description: To describe the foundation or starting point.

BGM.title: Beginning Of Message
BGM.description: To indicate the type and function of a message and to transmit the identifying number.

BII.title: Structure Identification
BII.description: A segment used to convey an indexing structure mechanism which identifies the positioning of a group or item.

BUS.title: Business Function
BUS.description: To provide information related to the processing and purpose of a financial message.

CAV.title: Characteristic Value
CAV.description: To provide the value of a characteristic.

CCD.title: Credit Cover Details
CCD.description: To request a credit cover, reply to that request and disclose the reason for the reply.

CCI.title: Characteristic/class Id
CCI.description: To identify and describe a specific characteristic and its relevance for subsequent business processes.

CDI.title: Physical Or Logical State
CDI.description: To describe a physical or logical state.

CDS.title: Code Set Identification
CDS.description: To identify a code set and to give its class and maintenance operation.

CDV.title: Code Value Definition
CDV.description: To provide information related to a code value.

CED.title: Computer Environment Details
CED.description: To give a precise definition of all necessary elements belonging to the configuration of a computer system like hardware, firmware, operating system, communication (VANS, network type, protocol, format) and application software.

CIN.title: Clinical Information
CIN.description: To describe an item of clinical information.

CLA.title: Clause Identification
CLA.description: To identify a clause in a treaty, law and/or contract.

CLI.title: Clinical Intervention
CLI.description: To specify a clinical intervention such as treatments and investigations.

CMP.title: Composite Data Element Identification
CMP.description: To identify a composite data element and to give its class and maintenance operation.

COD.title: Component Details
COD.description: To provide component details of an object (e.g. product, container) such as its type and the material of which it is composed.

COM.title: Communication Contact
COM.description: To identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

COT.title: Contribution Details
COT.description: To specify details about membership contributions.

CPS.title: Consignment Packing Sequence
CPS.description: To identify the sequence in which physical packing is presented in the consignment, and optionally to identify the hierarchical relationship between packing layers.

CST.title: Customs Status Of Goods
CST.description: To specify goods in terms of customs identities, status and intended use.

CTA.title: Contact Information
CTA.description: To identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

CUX.title: Currencies
CUX.description: To specify currencies used in the transaction and relevant details for the rate of exchange.

DAM.title: Damage
DAM.description: To specify damage including action taken.

DII.title: Directory Identification
DII.description: To identify a directory and to give its release, status, controlling agency, language and maintenance operation.

DLI.title: Document Line Identification
DLI.description: To specify the processing mode of a specific line within a referenced document.

DMS.title: Document/message Summary
DMS.description: To specify summary information relating to the document/message.

DOC.title: Document/message Details
DOC.description: To identify documents and details directly related to it.

DRD.title: Data Representation Details
DRD.description: To specify the details of the data representation.

DSG.title: Dosage Administration
DSG.description: To communicate how dose(s) are administered.

DTM.title: Date/time/period
DTM.description: To specify date, and/or time, or period.

EFI.title: External File Link Identification
EFI.description: To specify the link of one non-EDIFACT external file to an EDIFACT message.

ELM.title: Simple Data Element Details
ELM.description: To identify a simple data element and give related details.

ELU.title: Data Element Usage Details
ELU.description: To specify the usage of a data element.

EQA.title: Attached Equipment
EQA.description: To specify attached or related equipment.

EQD.title: Equipment Details
EQD.description: To identify a unit of equipment.

EQN.title: Number Of Units
EQN.description: To specify the number of units.

ERC.title: Application Error Information
ERC.description: To identify the type of application error within a message.

ERP.title: Error Point Details
ERP.description: A segment to identify the location of an application error within a message.

FII.title: Financial Institution Information
FII.description: To identify an account and a related financial institution.

FNS.title: Footnote Set
FNS.description: To identify a set of footnotes.

FSQ.title: Formula Sequence
FSQ.description: To provide a single operation within the sequence of operations of a formula.

FTX.title: Free Text
FTX.description: To provide free form or coded text information.

GDS.title: Nature Of Cargo
GDS.description: To indicate the type of cargo as a general classification.

GID.title: Goods Item Details
GID.description: To indicate totals of a goods item.

GIN.title: Goods Identity Number
GIN.description: To give specific identification numbers, either as single numbers or ranges.

GIR.title: Related Identification Numbers
GIR.description: To specify a related set of identification numbers.

GOR.title: Governmental Requirements
GOR.description: To indicate the requirement for a specific governmental action and/or procedure or which specific procedure is valid for a specific part of the transport and cross-border transactions.

GRU.title: Segment Group Usage Details
GRU.description: To specify the usage of a segment group within a message type structure and its maintenance operation.

HAN.title: Handling Instructions
HAN.description: To specify handling and where necessary, notify hazards.

HYN.title: Hierarchy Information
HYN.description: A segment to identify hierarchical connections from a given item to a higher or lower levelled item or to identify dependencies among the content of hierarchically related groups of data.

IFD.title: Information Detail
IFD.description: To specify details about items of information.

IHC.title: Person Characteristic
IHC.description: To specify characteristics of a person such as ethnic origin.

IMD.title: Item Description
IMD.description: To describe an item in either an industry or free format.

INP.title: Parties And Instruction
INP.description: To specify parties to an instruction, the instruction, or both.

INV.title: Inventory Management Related Details
INV.description: To provide the different information related to the inventory management functions and needed to process properly the inventory movements and the inventory balances.

IRQ.title: Information Required
IRQ.description: To indicate which information is requested in a responding message.

LIN.title: Line Item
LIN.description: To identify a line item and configuration.

LOC.title: Place/location Identification
LOC.description: To identify a place or a location and/or related locations.

MEA.title: Measurements
MEA.description: To specify physical measurements, including dimension tolerances, weights and counts.

MKS.title: Market/sales Channel Information
MKS.description: To specify to which market and/or through which sales distribution channel and/or for which end- use the sales of product/service have been made or are given as forecast.

MSG.title: Message Type Identification
MSG.description: To identify a message type and to give its class and maintenance operation.

MTD.title: Maintenance Operation Details
MTD.description: To identify a maintenance operation and its responsible parties.

NAD.title: Name And Address
NAD.description: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by C082 only and/or unstructured by C058 or structured by C080 thru 3207.

PAC.title: Package
PAC.description: To describe the number and type of packages/physical units.

PAI.title: Payment Instructions
PAI.description: To specify the instructions for payment.

PAS.title: Attendance
PAS.description: To specify attendance information relating to an individual.

PCC.title: Premium Calculation Component Details
PCC.description: To identify the component affecting a premium calculation and the value category of the component.

PCI.title: Package Identification
PCI.description: To specify markings and labels on individual packages or physical units.

PDI.title: Person Demographic Information
PDI.description: To specify items of person demographic information.

PER.title: Period Related Details
PER.description: Specification of details relating to a period.

PGI.title: Product Group Information
PGI.description: To indicate the group in which a product belongs.

PIA.title: Additional Product Id
PIA.description: To specify additional or substitutional item identification codes.

PNA.title: Party Identification
PNA.description: To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a party.

POC.title: Purpose Of Conveyance Call
POC.description: To specify the purpose of the call of the conveyance.

PRV.title: Proviso Details
PRV.description: Details regarding the stipulation or limitation in a document.

PSD.title: Physical Sample Description
PSD.description: To define the physical sample parameters associated with a test, resulting in discrete measurements.

PTY.title: Priority
PTY.description: The segment is used to communicate priority information.

PYT.title: Payment Terms
PYT.description: To specify the terms of payment.

QRS.title: Query And Response
QRS.description: To provide a declaration in the form of a coded question and response.

QUA.title: Qualification
QUA.description: To specify the qualification of a person.

QVR.title: Quantity Variances
QVR.description: To specify item details relating to quantity variances.

RCS.title: Requirements And Conditions
RCS.description: To specify sector/subject requirements and conditions.

ROD.title: Risk Object Type
ROD.description: To identify a type of object at risk.

RSL.title: Result
RSL.description: To specify a discrete or non-discrete result as a value or value range.

SCD.title: Structure Component Definition
SCD.description: To specify a component of a data structure (e.g. an array or table).

SEG.title: Segment Identification
SEG.description: To identify a segment and give its class and maintenance operation.

SEL.title: Seal Number
SEL.description: To specify the seal number or a range of seal numbers.

SEQ.title: Sequence Details
SEQ.description: To provide details relating to the sequence.

SGP.title: Split Goods Placement
SGP.description: To specify the placement of goods in relation to equipment.

SGU.title: Segment Usage Details
SGU.description: To specify the details of the usage of a segment within a message type structure.

SPR.title: Organisation Classification Details
SPR.description: To provide classification details relating to the activities of an organisation.

SPS.title: Sampling Parameters For Summary Statistics
SPS.description: To define the sampling parameters associated with summary statistics reported.

STA.title: Statistics
STA.description: To transmit summary statistics related to a specified collection of test result values.

STG.title: Stages
STG.description: To provide information related to the kind of stage in a process, the number of stages and the actual stage.

STS.title: Status
STS.description: To specify the status of an object or service, including its category and the reason(s) for the status.

TDT.title: Transport Information
TDT.description: To specify information regarding the transport such as mode of transport, means of transport, its conveyance reference number and the identification of the means of transport.

TEM.title: Test Method
TEM.description: To describe the nature of the test performed.

TMD.title: Transport Movement Details
TMD.description: To specify operational transport movement details for a goods item or equipment (which may differ from the contractual conditions).

TOD.title: Terms Of Delivery Or Transport
TOD.description: To specify terms of delivery or transport.

TPL.title: Transport Placement
TPL.description: To specify placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used. The segment serves as a pointer to the TDT segment group.

TSR.title: Transport Service Requirements
TSR.description: To specify the contract and carriage conditions and service and priority requirements for the transport.

VLI.title: Value List Identification
VLI.description: To identify a coded or non coded value list.
